mapper.sql: t.id, t.name, t.parent_id, t.parent_ids, t.parent_id AS parent_id, p.name AS parent_name, t.remarks, (select count(*) from sys_organization s WHERE s.parent_id=t.id) as hasChildren
LEFT JOIN sys_organization p ON p.id = t.parent_id
mapper.update:
update sys_organization set parent_ids= CONCAT(#{newParentIds},
substring(parent_ids, length(#{oldParentIds})+1,length(parent_ids)+1))
substr(parent_ids, length(#{oldParentIds})+1,length(parent_ids)+1))
where parent_ids like concat(#{oldParentIds}, '%')
mapper.delete: delete from sys_organization where parent_ids like concat(#{oldParentIds}, '%')
